subject: Steve's Box #1 ----Repaired
author: urkel23@aol.com
full_text:
--part1_28866.46ad7c94.395bfffe_boundary
Content-Type: multipart/alternative;
	boundary="part1_28866.46ad7c94.395bfffe_alt_boundary"


--part1_28866.46ad7c94.395bfffe_alt_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Never a shortage of boxes coming back for repair.  This was my first  one, 
so i had to look at what i did with blinders on.  Bad Wire used,  sloppy 
solder connections......Was i ever that young?....LOL
 
I swapped out the board and re-wired everything, sounds pretty good  now.  
If this comes back again, it won't be from a bad  connection.......It's as 
solid as concrete in there now, i also upgraded it to  all the latest updates 
i've been working on.
 
-Steve H.
 
 
 
Steve Hultay
_www.keyportparanormal.com_ (http://www.keyportparanormal.com/)
